mapper.sql: id, fromSystem, proofreadType, DATE_FORMAT(proofreadDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as proofreadDate, businessOrderNum, borrowNum, businessExchangeMoney, businessOrderStatuts, DATE_FORMAT(businessOrderCreateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as businessOrderCreateTime, channel, channelExchangeMoney, channelOrderStatus, channelOrderCreateTime, DATE_FORMAT(disposeTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as disposeTime, remark, errorType, flowStatus, updateUser

id, CASE fromSystem WHEN '01' THEN '美期' WHEN '02' THEN '米融' WHEN '03' THEN '秒呗' ELSE '其他' END as fromSystem, CASE proofreadType WHEN '01' THEN '借款' WHEN '02' THEN '还款' ELSE '其他' END as proofreadType, DATE_FORMAT(proofreadDate,'%Y-%m-%d') as proofreadDate, businessOrderNum, borrowNum, businessExchangeMoney, businessOrderCreateTime, channel, channelExchangeMoney, channelOrderStatus, CASE proofreadType WHEN '01' THEN (case businessOrderStatuts when '0' then '申请/未审核' WHEN '1' then "已结清" WHEN '2' then "打款中" WHEN '3' then "打款失败" WHEN '4' then "关闭" WHEN '5' then ":已经打款/待还款" end) WHEN '02' THEN (case businessOrderStatuts when '0' then '新建状态' WHEN '1' then "还款成功" WHEN '2' then ":处理中" WHEN '-1' then "还款失败" end) END as businessOrderStatuts, channelOrderCreateTime, DATE_FORMAT(disposeTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as disposeTime, remark, CASE errorType WHEN '01' THEN '金额不一致' WHEN '02' THEN '渠道有业务没有' WHEN '03' THEN '业务有渠道没有' ELSE '其他' END as errorType, CASE flowStatus WHEN '01' THEN '待处理' WHEN '02' THEN '已预留' WHEN '03' THEN '已归档' WHEN '04' THEN '已失效' ELSE '其他' END as flowStatus, updateUser
mapper.update: UPDATE ua_t_account_proofreadError SET flowStatus=#{flowStatus} WHERE flowStatus='02'
